00069 /* directions */
00071 #define _XDIR_ 0
00072 
00073 #define _YDIR_ 1

00081 #define _NavierStokes2DGetFlowVar_(u,rho,vx,vy,e,P,p) \
00082   { \
00083     double  gamma = p->gamma, vsq; \
00084     rho = u[0]; \
00085     vx  = u[1] / rho; \
00086     vy  = u[2] / rho; \
00087     e   = u[3]; \
00088     vsq  = (vx*vx) + (vy*vy); \
00089     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*vsq) * (gamma-1.0); \
00090   }
00091 
00099 #define _NavierStokes2DSetFlux_(f,rho,vx,vy,e,P,dir) \
00100   { \
00101     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00102       f[0] = rho * vx; \
00103       f[1] = rho * vx * vx + P; \
00104       f[2] = rho * vx * vy; \
00105       f[3] = (e + P) * vx; \
00106     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00107       f[0] = rho * vy; \
00108       f[1] = rho * vy * vx; \
00109       f[2] = rho * vy * vy + P; \
00110       f[3] = (e + P) * vy; \
00111     } \
00112   }
00113 
00125 #define _NavierStokes2DSetStiffFlux_(f,rho,vx,vy,e,P,dir,gamma) \
00126   { \
00127     double gamma_inv = 1.0/gamma; \
00128     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00129       f[0] = gamma_inv * rho * vx; \
00130       f[1] = gamma_inv * rho * vx * vx + P; \
00131       f[2] = gamma_inv * rho * vx * vy; \
00132       f[3] = (e + P) * vx - 0.5 * gamma_inv * (gamma-1.0) * rho * (vx*vx+vy*vy) * vx; \
00133     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00134       f[0] = gamma_inv * rho * vy; \
00135       f[1] = gamma_inv * rho * vy * vx; \
00136       f[2] = gamma_inv * rho * vy * vy + P; \
00137       f[3] = (e + P) * vy - 0.5 * gamma_inv * (gamma-1.0) * rho * (vx*vx+vy*vy) * vy; \
00138     } \
00139   }
00140 
00152 #define _NavierStokes2DSetNonStiffFlux_(f,rho,vx,vy,e,P,dir,gamma) \
00153   { \
00154     double gamma_inv = 1.0/gamma; \
00155     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00156       f[0] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vx; \
00157       f[1] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vx * vx; \
00158       f[2] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vx * vy; \
00159       f[3] = 0.5 * gamma_inv * (gamma-1.0) * rho * (vx*vx+vy*vy) * vx; \
00160     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00161       f[0] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vy; \
00162       f[1] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vy * vx; \
00163       f[2] = (gamma-1.0) * gamma_inv * rho * vy * vy; \
00164       f[3] = 0.5 * gamma_inv * (gamma-1.0) * rho * (vx*vx+vy*vy) * vy; \
00165     } \
00166   }
00167 
00171 #define _NavierStokes2DRoeAverage_(uavg,uL,uR,p) \
00172   { \
00173     double  rho ,vx, vy, e ,P ,H ,csq, vsq; \
00174     double  rhoL,vxL,vyL,eL,PL,HL,cLsq,vsqL; \
00175     double  rhoR,vxR,vyR,eR,PR,HR,cRsq,vsqR; \
00176     double  gamma = p->gamma; \
00177     rhoL = uL[0]; \
00178     vxL  = uL[1] / rhoL; \
00179     vyL  = uL[2] / rhoL; \
00180     eL   = uL[3]; \
00181     vsqL = (vxL*vxL) + (vyL*vyL); \
00182     PL   = (eL - 0.5*rhoL*vsqL) * (gamma-1.0); \
00183     cLsq = gamma * PL/rhoL; \
00184     HL = 0.5*(vxL*vxL+vyL*vyL) + cLsq / (gamma-1.0); \
00185     rhoR = uR[0]; \
00186     vxR  = uR[1] / rhoR; \
00187     vyR  = uR[2] / rhoR; \
00188     eR   = uR[3]; \
00189     vsqR = (vxR*vxR) + (vyR*vyR); \
00190     PR   = (eR - 0.5*rhoR*vsqR) * (gamma-1.0); \
00191     cRsq = gamma * PR/rhoR; \
00192     HR = 0.5*(vxR*vxR+vyR*vyR) + cRsq / (gamma-1.0); \
00193     double tL = sqrt(rhoL); \
00194     double tR = sqrt(rhoR); \
00195     rho = tL * tR; \
00196     vx  = (tL*vxL + tR*vxR) / (tL + tR); \
00197     vy  = (tL*vyL + tR*vyR) / (tL + tR); \
00198     H   = (tL*HL + tR*HR) / (tL + tR); \
00199     vsq = vx*vx + vy*vy; \
00200     csq = (gamma-1.0) * (H-0.5*vsq); \
00201     P   = csq * rho / gamma; \
00202     e   = P/(gamma-1.0) + 0.5*rho*vsq; \
00203     uavg[0] = rho; \
00204     uavg[1] = rho*vx; \
00205     uavg[2] = rho*vy; \
00206     uavg[3] = e; \
00207   }
00208 
00214 #define _NavierStokes2DEigenvalues_(u,D,p,dir) \
00215   { \
00216     double  gamma = p->gamma; \
00217     double  rho,vx,vy,e,P,c,vn,vsq; \
00218     rho = u[0]; \
00219     vx  = u[1] / rho; \
00220     vy  = u[2] / rho; \
00221     e   = u[3]; \
00222     vsq  = (vx*vx) + (vy*vy); \
00223     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*vsq) * (gamma-1.0); \
00224     c    = sqrt(gamma*P/rho); \
00225     if      (dir == _XDIR_) vn = vx; \
00226     else if (dir == _YDIR_) vn = vy; \
00227     else               vn = 0.0; \
00228     if (dir == _XDIR_) {\
00229       D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vn-c;   D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00230       D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vn+c; D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00231       D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vn;     D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00232       D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vn; \
00233     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00234       D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vn-c;   D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00235       D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vn;   D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00236       D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vn+c;   D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00237       D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;    D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      D[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vn; \
00238     }\
00239   }
00240 
00249 #define _NavierStokes2DLeftEigenvectors_(u,L,p,dir) \
00250   { \
00251     double  ga = param->gamma, ga_minus_one=ga-1.0; \
00252     double  rho,vx,vy,e,P,a,un,ek,vsq; \
00253     double  nx = 0,ny = 0; \
00254     rho = u[0]; \
00255     vx  = u[1] / rho; \
00256     vy  = u[2] / rho; \
00257     e   = u[3]; \
00258     vsq  = (vx*vx) + (vy*vy); \
00259     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*vsq) * (ga-1.0); \
00260     ek = 0.5 * (vx*vx + vy*vy); \
00261       a = sqrt(ga * P / rho); \
00262     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00263       un = vx; \
00264       nx = 1.0; \
00265         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek + a*un) / (2*a*a); \
00266         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vx - a*nx) / (2*a*a); \
00267           L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vy - a*ny) / (2*a*a); \
00268         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00269         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (a*a - ga_minus_one*ek) / (a*a); \
00270         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = (ga_minus_one*vx) / (a*a); \
00271         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = (ga_minus_one*vy) / (a*a); \
00272           L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = (-ga_minus_one) / (a*a); \
00273           L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek - a*un) / (2*a*a); \
00274         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vx + a*nx) / (2*a*a); \
00275         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((-ga_minus_one)*vy + a*ny) / (2*a*a); \
00276           L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00277         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (vy - un*ny) / nx; \
00278         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ny; \
00279           L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = (ny*ny - 1.0) / nx; \
00280         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0.0; \
00281     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) {  \
00282       un = vy;  \
00283       ny = 1.0; \
00284         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek+a*un) / (2*a*a); \
00285           L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((1.0-ga)*vx - a*nx) / (2*a*a); \
00286         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((1.0-ga)*vy - a*ny) / (2*a*a); \
00287         L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00288           L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (a*a-ga_minus_one*ek) / (a*a); \
00289         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ga_minus_one*vx / (a*a); \
00290         L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ga_minus_one*vy / (a*a); \
00291           L[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = (1.0 - ga) / (a*a); \
00292           L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (ga_minus_one*ek-a*un) / (2*a*a); \
00293         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ((1.0-ga)*vx + a*nx) / (2*a*a); \
00294         L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ((1.0-ga)*vy + a*ny) / (2*a*a); \
00295           L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ga_minus_one / (2*a*a); \
00296           L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = (un*nx-vx) / ny; \
00297         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = (1.0 - nx*nx) / ny; \
00298         L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = - nx; \
00299           L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 0; \
00300     } \
00301   }
00302 
00311 #define _NavierStokes2DRightEigenvectors_(u,R,p,dir) \
00312   { \
00313     double  ga   = param->gamma, ga_minus_one = ga-1.0; \
00314     double  rho,vx,vy,e,P,un,ek,a,h0,vsq; \
00315     double  nx = 0,ny = 0; \
00316     rho = u[0]; \
00317     vx  = u[1] / rho; \
00318     vy  = u[2] / rho; \
00319     e   = u[3]; \
00320     vsq  = (vx*vx) + (vy*vy); \
00321     P   = (e - 0.5*rho*vsq) * (ga-1.0); \
00322       ek   = 0.5 * (vx*vx + vy*vy); \
00323     a    = sqrt(ga * P / rho); \
00324     h0   = a*a / ga_minus_one + ek; \
00325       if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00326         un = vx; \
00327       nx = 1.0; \
00328         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 1.0; \
00329         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vx - a*nx; \
00330         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vy - a*ny; \
00331         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = h0 - a*un; \
00332         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 1.0; \
00333         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vx; \
00334         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vy; \
00335         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ek; \
00336         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 1.0; \
00337         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vx + a*nx; \
00338         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vy + a*ny; \
00339         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = h0 + a*un; \
00340         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00341         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = ny; \
00342         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = -nx; \
00343         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vx*ny - vy*nx; \
00344     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00345       un = vy; \
00346       ny = 1.0; \
00347         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 1.0; \
00348         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vx - a*nx; \
00349         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vy - a*ny; \
00350         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = h0 - a*un; \
00351         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = 1.0; \
00352         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vx; \
00353         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = vy; \
00354         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+3] = ek; \
00355         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 1.0; \
00356         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vx + a*nx; \
00357         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vy + a*ny; \
00358         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = h0 + a*un; \
00359         R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0; \
00360         R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = ny; \
00361         R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = -nx; \
00362         R[3*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vx*ny-vy*nx; \
00363     } \
00364   }

00376 typedef struct navierstokes2d_parameters {
00377   double  gamma;                          
00378   char    upw_choice[_MAX_STRING_SIZE_];  
00379   double  grav_x,                         
00380           grav_y;                         
00381   double  rho0;                           
00382   double  p0;                             
00383   double  Re;                             
00384   double  Pr;                             
00385   double  Minf;                           
00386   double  C1,                             
00387           C2;                             
00388   double  R;                              
00390   double  *grav_field_f, 
00391           *grav_field_g; 
00393   double *fast_jac, 
00394          *solution; 
00396   /* choice of hydrostatic balance                              */
00397   /* 1 -> isothermal                                            */
00398   /* 2 -> constant potential temperature                        */ 
00399   /* 3 -> stratified atmosphere with a Brunt-Vaisala frequency  */
00400   int HB ;
00403   double N_bv; 
00405 } NavierStokes2D;

00408 int    NavierStokes2DCleanup    (void*);
